mapper.update: update db_vibe_monitor.t_alarm_message set handled = 2 where id = #{id}
update db_vibe_monitor.t_alarm_rule set rule = #{rule},way = #{way},start = #{start} where assetId = #{assetId}
mapper.select: select a.id,caption,assetId,state,time startTime,auto,errorMessage,handled,(select time from db_vibe_monitor.t_error_message_log t where t.assetId = e.assetId order by t.id desc limit 0,1) endTime from db_vibe_monitor.t_alarm_message a,db_vibe_monitor.t_error_message_log e where a.logId = e.id and auto = 1 and assetId = #{assetId} union select a.id,caption,assetId,state,time startTime,auto,errorMessage,handled,endTime from db_vibe_monitor.t_alarm_message a,db_vibe_monitor.t_error_message_log e where a.logId = e.id and auto = 2 and assetId = #{assetId} order by endTime desc
